ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: IP Address of Pentair Intellicenter. Should be static or DHCP-reserved

password.title: Password
password.description: Password for the Pentair Intellicenter account. Warning: This is stored in the plugin in plaintext

temperatureUnits.title: Temperature Units
temperatureUnits.description: Celsius or Fahrenheit as configured in IntelliCenter

minimumTemperature.title: Minimum Temperature
minimumTemperature.description: Minimum temperature to be used by HomeKit slider. Use same units as configured above.

maximumTemperature.title: Maximum Temperature
maximumTemperature.description: Maximum temperature to be used by HomeKit slider. Use same units as configured above.

supportVSP.title: Show Variable Speed Pumps (VSPs)
supportVSP.description: Enable this option if your system has variable speed pump control on its circuits and if you want them visible in HomeKit.

airTemp.title: Show the outside Air Temperature
airTemp.description: Display the outside air temperature as a sensor in HomeKit.

includeAllCircuits.title: Include All Circuits (Advanced)
includeAllCircuits.description: Include circuits that are not marked as 'Features' in IntelliCenter. Warning: This may expose internal system circuits that shouldn't be controlled directly.
